title: Marvella emerges as Bangladesh's first AI influencer
body: The influencer award program “Marvel of Tomorrow: Season 3” has unveiled Bangladesh's first AI-generated influencer, named “Marvella”. This creation is a collaborative effort between “The Wider Collective” and “The Marvel – Be You”. According to the launch video, Marvella is a combination of "thousands of personalities" and operates akin to generative AI, continuously evolving and adapting based on its interactions and experiences. Crafted to embody the traits of a 22-year-old graphic designer, Marvella shares common human interests such as travel, sketching, and active engagement on social media platforms. Notably, Marvella maintains an Instagram presence to share her future plans, as revealed by “The Marvel - Be You”. During her official introduction, online users swiftly observed her uncanny resemblance to the South Indian actress Shriya Saran. Additionally, her speech patterns, blending English and Bengali accents, have arisen curiosity and interest among viewers.
